constitutionalsection.catchline: Donation of state lands prohibited; when.
constitutionalsection.para: Lands under control of the State shall never be donated to railroad companies, private corporations or individuals.

annotation.para: Industrial Development Act of 1961 was sustained as constitutional under constitutional amendment notwithstanding this section. State ex rel. Meyer v. County of Lancaster, 173 Neb. 195, 113 N.W.2d 63 (1962).
